name: Sand Ray
description: The Sand Ray is a large, cunning aberration resembling a patch of sand when motionless. It possesses a formidable build with powerful physical attributes and is designed for aerial maneuvers.
memorable: Its ability to blend into sandy environments makes it an elusive predator, capable of striking fear into its prey with psychological attacks.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures, deliver psychic fear, and maintain dominance in its territory.
relations: It may serve as a guardian of sandy terrains or be a potential ally to other aberrations.
environment: Typically found in sandy or arid environments where it can utilize its False Appearance.
strengths: High strength for powerful melee attacks, stealth skills for ambush tactics, and the ability to frighten enemies.
weaknesses: Light Sensitivity imposes disadvantage in bright light environments.
attacks: Features a powerful Bite that grapples and blinds, and a Tail attack that inflicts slashing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Moan, which can frighten non-aberration creatures and influence the tide of battle.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to thrive in dim light or darkness.
skills: Possesses stealth proficiency, making it adept at ambushing.
additional_information: False Appearance allows it to mimic sand.
When grappling, it can transfer damage to the prey.
Can create phantasms to gain an advantage against attacks.
Immunity to being charmed or frightened.
test_queries: psychological creature with powerful bite attack
flying aberration that blends in with sand
monster that frightens enemies with moan
large creature with disadvantage in bright light
